Invocation Name: hayward
des:
Say goodbye to searching for your phone or uncharged remote to control your pool, just use your voice! The Hayward OmniLogic backyard pool/spa controller working with Alexa makes it more convenient than ever to control and create the ultimate backyard ambiance experience.

Using OmniLogic with Alexa is the most amazing way to control your pool, spa and backyard features

You can turn on/off your themes, features, lighting and heating with Alexa.

There's no need to hunt for your remotes - just ask Alexa to control your pool.

After connecting Alexa to your Hayward OmniLogic in a few simple steps, just say commands like "Alexa, ask Hayward for the status of my pool", or "Alexa, ask Hayward to turn on my spa party.", or "Alexa, ask Hayward to turn my pool lights on Voodoo Lounge"

Here are examples of how you can use the Skill:

Alexa, tell/ask Hayward to turn on my Themes (Spa Party, Pool Party, Kids Party, you name them)

Alexa, tell/ask Hayward to turn on the Pool Lights.

Alexa, tell/ask Hayward to set the Spa Lights (can Add) to Deep Blue Sea, or any 16 colors or shows.

Alexa, ask Hayward to set Pool temperature to 85 degrees

Alexa, ask Hayward to set Spa temperature to 104 degrees

Alexa, ask Hayward for the status of my pool

Alexa, ask Hayward to turn off all features

Amazon would like us to inform you that this skill may not be suitable for all ages.
